title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching between perspectives in the Eclipse IDE, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
OB: After following the steps mentioned in the SR, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized when switching between perspectives.
SR: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.2. Double click the title bar of the view to maximize it.3. Switch to the resource perspective.4. Return to the Java perspective.
